issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi, good day,

I'm developing an app with MapModule updated but the problem is present when click annotation in a map.

fields.summary: NullPointerException when click Map Annotation TIMOB-12857
fields.environment: Android 4.0.3, Titanium SDK 3.0.2GA, Map Module commit 6bde65405649f2e14045b26e048406182b2cbade

comments.body:
Hello,

Can you please provide a sample code to replicate the problem?

Thank you
I am having the exact same issue. This is marked as "Needs more info." What info is needed to get this resolved. Thanks!

We have not been able to reproduce the reported issue with 3.2.0 SDK release. Please note that there were a number of native map crashes and memory leaks on Android platform that were resolved with V2 version. 

We would suggest you to upgrade to 3.2.0 SDK and let us know if the issue persists and we would be happy to investigate it further.
